assignRole(address,uint8).details: Only the contract owner can assign roles

params._user: Address of the user to assign the role to

batchAssignRoles(address[],uint8[]).details: Only the contract owner can batch assign roles, useful for initial setup

params._roles: Array of roles corresponding to each user

returns.compliant: Whether all checkpoints had acceptable temperatures

constructor.details: Initializes the contract, setting the deployer as the owner

returns._0: Address of pending owner (address(0) if none)
Product struct containing all product data

params._maxResults: Maximum number of results to return

getProductsByStatus(uint8,uint256).details: Returns array of product IDs with a specific status

params._maxResults: Maximum number of results to return

registerProduct(string,string).details: Creates a new product with Manufactured status and assigns it to the caller

params._batchNumber: Manufacturing batch number (must not be empty)

returns.productId: Unique identifier assigned to the product

revokeUser(address).details: Only the contract owner can revoke users, sets role to None and removes authorization

params._user: Address of the user to revoke

setPaused(bool).details: Emergency function to halt operations if needed

setTemperatureThresholds(int256,int256).details: Only owner can update temperature limits

transferContractOwnership(address).details: Two-step process to prevent accidental transfers to wrong address

transferOwnership(uint256,address).details: Updates the current holder and creates a checkpoint for the transfer

addCheckpoint(uint256,string,uint8,strin.notice: Adds a checkpoint to a product's supply chain journey

assignRole(address,uint8).notice: Assigns a role to a user in the supply chain system

batchAssignRoles(address[],uint8[]).notice: Batch assigns roles to multiple users

checkTemperatureCompliance(uint256).notice: Checks if temperature compliance was maintained throughout journey

getCurrentHolder(uint256).notice: Gets the current holder of a product

getProductCheckpoints(uint256).notice: Retrieves all checkpoints for a product

getProductCount().notice: Gets the total number of products registered

getUserRole(address).notice: Gets the role assigned to a user

isAuthorized(address).notice: Checks if a user is authorized in the system

isPaused().notice: Checks if the contract is currently paused

registerProduct(string,string).notice: Registers a new product on the blockchain

revokeUser(address).notice: Revokes a user's access to the system

setTemperatureThresholds(int256,int256).notice: Updates the temperature thresholds for cold chain monitoring

transferContractOwnership(address).notice: Initiates ownership transfer to a new owner (step 1 of 2)

transferOwnership(uint256,address).notice: Transfers ownership of a product to a new holder

verifyProduct(uint256).notice: Verifies if a product exists and returns its authenticity status
